successes.title: Make LA Game Space possible!
successes.description: Help create a global resource that will foster interesting, exciting games for years to come.

Pledges.description: «INTRO PACK» A NEW GAME by Keita Takahashi (creator of Katamari Damacy and Noby Noby Boy) exclusive to this Kickstarter!
«GAME PACK» 30 VIDEO GAMES!  An experimental game and prototype pack with 30 original games from indie game makers, media/net artists, authors, filmmakers, architects, and comic creators!

⬆ ALL OF THE ABOVE, PLUS— 
«FOUNDER PACK» FOUNDER CREDIT at the Space and on our website + the 24 HOUR NON-STOP MUSIC CLOCK MIX by DUBLAB

⬆ ALL OF THE ABOVE, PLUS— 
«LA/GS PACK» 1 T-SHIRT (choices include designs by world-famous pixel artists eBoy and Bryan Lee O'Malley, creator of Scott Pilgrim!) + a limited edition LA/GS ZINE + a massive GAME HISTORY POSTER (27"×40")

⬆ ALL OF THE ABOVE, PLUS— 
«PRINT PACK» ALL 15 PRINTS! (Each is a beautiful 11"×17" color risograph!) + a 1-YEAR MEMBERSHIP to LA Game Space!
░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░ 
Exclusive prints by Jon Burgerman • Martin Cendreda • Oleg Dubrovsky • Hellen Jo • Ben Jones • Christopher Kardambikis • Most Ancient • Alexander Peverett • John Pham • Rafael Rozendaal • Nicolas Sassoon • Travess Smalley • Yoshi Sodeoka • Artie Vierkant • Jon Vermilyea

⬆ ALL OF THE ABOVE, PLUS— 
«PIXEL PORTRAIT» YOUR PIXEL PORTRAIT created by some of the most talented pixel artists ever! 
░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░ 
Army of Trolls [Gary J. Lucken] • Enso [Alex Bond] • Mr. GIF • Vic Nguyen (Super TIME Force) • Paul Robertson (Pirate Cabana Baby, Mercenary Kings) • Adam Saltsman (Canabalt) • Paul Veer (Gun Godz) • Derek Yu (Spelunky)
⬆ ALL OF THE ABOVE, PLUS— «SUPER FOUNDER» YOUR PIXEL PORTRAIT and NAME displayed prominently on the founder wall at the Space and on our website too!

⬆ ALL OF THE ABOVE, PLUS— 
«ULTRA FOUNDER» LIFETIME MEMBERSHIP!  Infinite lives! And acknowledgement (with PIXEL PORTRAIT) on our founder wall/website as an Ultra Founder!

⬆ ALL OF THE ABOVE, PLUS— 
«YOU ARE IN•THE•GAME» be a PLAYABLE CHARACTER in Gaijin Games' RUNNER2! They'll create a fully-animated 3D model of you that will be an unlockable character in Runner2 for Mac/PC!

⬆ ALL REWARDS AT $1000 and BELOW, PLUS— 
░░░░░░░░░░░ «64-BIT SPONSOR» HOST AN EVENT AT THE SPACE! And YOUR NAME/LOGO will be in ALL PRINTED MATERIAL (exhibit catalogs, event programs, and publications) for the first year!

⬆ ALL REWARDS AT $1000 and BELOW, PLUS— ░░░░░░░░░░░ «128-BIT SPONSOR» YOUR NAME/LOGO will be forever included in EVERY LIVE STREAM and ARCHIVED VIDEO made during the first year, and they'll appear in ALL PRINTED MATERIALS too!
⬆ ALL REWARDS AT $1000 and BELOW, PLUS—  ░░░░░░░░░░░ «LA/GS PARTNER» MEMBERSHIP for your EMPLOYEES for the first year! (up to 200 memberships)
